title: Tabletop.Simulator.The.Captain.Is.Dead-PLAZA
description:
Tabletop Simulator - The Captain Is Dead (c) Berserk Games

Release Date: 08/2016 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Casual

Create your own original games, import custom assets, automate
games with scripting, set up complete RPG dungeons, manipulate the
physics, create hinges & joints, and of course flip the table when
you are losing the game. All with an easy to use system integrated
with Steam Workshop. You can do anything you want in Tabletop
Simulator. The possibilities are endless!

Notes: This standalone version contains all previous DLCS
For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/286160/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
